title: Why did my friend get a 14 day ban for this????
body: We were just in an Aram game because we were bored. We get to the end of the game and a player on the enemy team says some random thing with the word "%%%%%" in it. This doesn't really bother me but my friend in the end game lobby chat says "Imagine saying %%%%% in Aram". The next day he has a 14-day suspension... ok riot. And what even annoys me more is that he had bought the snow down ticket hoping to get the new Prestige Akali and this 14-day suspension COMPLETELY ruined his chances of getting it so it was a complete waste of his money...

replies.body: If that is the whole story, then they were picked up by the system for hate speech because it didn't catch that they were quoting another player, and they can appeal the punishment through [player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
He tried to but he just got a reply from a bot...
Reply to the ticket, it will get a second review. First response is often customised macro and I'll be the first to admit they sometimes miss the mark. Any further responses will be custom.
